code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'../axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminStats=()=>{const[stats,setStats]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchStats=async()=>{setLoading(true);setError('');try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const res=await axios.get('/api/auth/admin/stats',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setStats(res.data);}catch(err){setError('Could not fetch stats.');}setLoading(false);};fetchStats();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{color:'#E5E7EB',maxWidth:'600px',margin:'0 auto'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{color:'#2ECC71',fontWeight:700,fontSize:'1.7rem',marginBottom:'1.2rem'},children:"Site Statistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{background:'#23272F',borderRadius:'1rem',padding:'2rem',boxShadow:'0 2px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)'},children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'#FF6B35'},children:error}):stats?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{style:{listStyle:'none',padding:0,fontSize:'1.2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{marginBottom:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Total Users:"})," ",stats.userCount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{marginBottom:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Total Subscriptions:"})," ",stats.subCount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{marginBottom:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Active Subscriptions:"})," ",stats.activeSubs]})]}):null})]});};export default AdminStats;
